cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with transmission schemes in wireless networks, which falls under the category of information theory (cs.IT) and networked systems (cs.NI). The use of Markov Decision Processes (MDPs) and reinforcement learning algorithms suggests a focus on control and decision-making in systems, which falls under the category of systems and control (cs.SY). The paper also discusses the use of reward functions and optimization, which are common topics in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
